Data Types (int)


$a \in $ int   $b \in $ int


$a + b \in $ int

$a - b \in $ int

$a \times b \in $ int

$a \;/\; b \in $ int

$a \;\%\; b \in $ int

Data Types



The type of a variable determines


  • the set of values it may take on and

  • what operations can be performed on them.

Data Types (double)


DBL_MIN   DBL_MAX


printf("DBL_MIN = %f \t DBL_MAX = %f\n", DBL_MIN, DBL_MAX);
